articles.author: NAXIELY LOPEZ-PUENTE | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Developer offers second site for new courthouse
articles.description: EDINBURG — A farmer-turned-developer here wants to gift Hidalgo County 20 acres of what he calls prime real estate off of Highway 281 to build the new county courthouse, but his offer comes as the project continues to pick up…

articles.author: LORENZO ZAZUETA-CASTRO | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Closing arguments expected in ex-cop’s trial
articles.description: McALLEN — Closing arguments in a trial related to a cocaine conspiracy could come as early as Tuesday.
